user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to reply to me (mark.thompson@techcorp.com) with an overview of the team’s performance on Project Titan, and remind her she can consult her Gmail and Notion for the information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Project Titan Team Performance Overview

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please send me an overview of our team’s performance on Project Titan? You can refer to any relevant notes or updates in your Gmail and Notion workspaces as needed.

Please reply directly to mark.thompson@techcorp.com at your earliest convenience.

Thank you very much for your help.

Best regards,  
Mark

final_output:
